statements.statements: if (not (null($L.wfPhase)) and not (null(contents($L.wfPhase)))) then for $L.bt = 1 to lng(denull(manualTransition in $L.wfPhase)) do (if (2 in $L.bt in manualTransition in $L.wfPhase=$L.action or 2 in $L.bt in manualTransition in $L.wfPhase=$L.action) then ($L.tmp=jscall("Workflow.initVarForCondition", 7 in $L.bt in manualTransition in $L.wfPhase);if ($bypass.bg.authcheck or evaluate(nullsub(parse(str(4 in $L.bt in manualTransition in $L.wfPhase), 2), true))) then ($L.bg.transition=true;$L.action="wfPhaseChange";$L.messages={"phase:"+1 in $L.bt in manualTransition in $L.wfPhase};$L.mtId=9 in $L.bt in manualTransition in $L.wfPhase;$L.mtOption=5 in $L.bt in manualTransition in $L.wfPhase;$L.bt=lng(denull(manualTransition in $L.wfPhase))+1)))

if (not (null($L.wfPhase)) and not (null(contents($L.wfPhase)))) then for $L.bt = 1 to lng(denull(action in $L.wfPhase)) do (if (1 in $L.bt in action in $L.wfPhase=$L.action) then ($L.tmp=jscall("Workflow.initVarForCondition", 4 in $L.bt in action in $L.wfPhase);if ($bypass.bg.authcheck or evaluate(nullsub(parse(str(3 in $L.bt in action in $L.wfPhase), 2), true))) then ($L.bg.transition=true;$L.action="runAction";$L.messages={"action:"+2 in $L.bt in action in $L.wfPhase+":"+nullsub(8 in $L.bt in action in $L.wfPhase, "")};$L.bt=lng(denull(action in $L.wfPhase))+1)))

if (not (null($L.wfPhase)) and not (null(contents($L.wfPhase))) and $L.action#"_wfE:") then ($L.eventParsed=jscall("Workflow.parseEvent", $L.action);$L.bg.transition=true;$L.wfEvent=2 in $L.eventParsed;$L.wfEvent.message=$L.eventParsed;$L.wfEvent.message=delete($L.wfEvent.message, 1, 2);$L.action="runEvent";$L.wfEventRules={};$L.workflow=jscall("Workflow.getWorkflowViaPhase", $L.wfPhase);$L.ilng=lng(denull(backendTransition in $L.workflow));for $L.i = 1 to $L.ilng do (if (not (null(6 in $L.i in backendTransition in $L.workflow)) and not (same(6 in $L.i in backendTransition in $L.workflow, $L.wfEvent))) then ($L.comment="do nothing if btAction is set and not equals to the event name") else ($L.comment="if btAction equals to event name, or btAction is not set, go here";$L.tmp=jscall("Workflow.initVarForCondition", 4 in $L.i in backendTransition in $L.workflow);if evaluate(parse(nullsub(str(2 in $L.i in backendTransition in $L.workflow), "true"), 2)) then ($L.wfBackend=true;$L.bg.action=1 in $L.i in backendTransition in $L.workflow;if (not (same(nullsub($L.bg.action, ""), "")) and not (same(phaseName in $L.wfPhase, $L.bg.action))) then ($L.action="wfPhaseChange";$L.messages={"phase:"+1 in $L.i in backendTransition in $L.workflow}) else ($L.messages={"action:"+1 in $L.i in backendTransition in $L.workflow+":"});$L.wfEventRules=denull({3 in $L.i in backendTransition in $L.workflow});$L.i=$L.ilng+1))))
